005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IResourceLocation;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraint;
010
011import java.net.URI;
012
013import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
015
016/**
017 * Provides information about an individual finding that is the result of a
018 * completed content validation.
019 */
020public interface IValidationFinding {
021  /**
022   * The finding type.
023   */
024  enum Kind {
025    /**
026     * The finding does not apply to the intended purpose of the validation.
027     */
028    NOT_APPLICABLE,
029    /**
030     * The finding represents a successful result.
031     */
032    PASS,
033    /**
034     * The finding represents an unsuccessful result.
035     */
036    FAIL,
037    /**
038     * The finding is providing information that does not indicate success or
039     * failure.
040     */
041    INFORMATIONAL;
042  }
043
044  /**
045   * Get the unique identifier for the finding.
046   *
047   * @return the identifier
048   */
049  @Nullable
050  String getIdentifier();
051
052  /**
053   * Get the finding's severity.
054   *
055   * @return the severity
056   */
057  @NonNull
058  IConstraint.Level getSeverity();
059
060  /**
061   * Get the finding type.
062   *
063   * @return the finding type
064   */
065  @NonNull
066  Kind getKind();
067
068  /**
069   * Get the document's URI.
070   *
071   * @return the document's URI or {@code null} if it is not known
072   */
073  @Nullable
074  URI getDocumentUri();
075
076  /**
077   * Get the location in the associated resource associated with the finding.
078   *
079   * @return the location or {@code null} if no location is known
080   */
081  @Nullable
082  IResourceLocation getLocation();
083
084  /**
085   * Get the path expression type provided by the {@link #getPath()} method.
086   *
087   * @return the path type identifier or {@code null} if unknown
088   */
089  @Nullable
090  String getPathKind();
091
092  /**
093   * A format specific path to the finding in the source document.
094   *
095   * @return the path or {@code null} if unknown
096   */
097  @Nullable
098  String getPath();
099
100  /**
101   * Get the finding message.
102   *
103   * @return the message or {@code null} if there is no message
104   */
105  @Nullable
106  String getMessage();
107
108  /**
109   * Get the exception associated with the finding.
110   *
111   * @return the {@link Throwable} or {@code null} if no thowable is associated
112   *         with the finding
113   */
114  Throwable getCause();
115}
